articles.title: Grab Samsung's Galaxy Note 10+ for $850 at Amazon - Engadget
articles.description: Amazon has cut the price of Samsung's Galaxy Note 10+ to $850 -- a hefty $250 off the price of the flagship-class phone.

articles.title: Why Pokemon Go GO Battle League is down and when it will return - Dexerto

On June 12, Niantic announced that they were disabling Pokemon Go's GO Battle League until further notice due to an in-game exploit.
